QuestData.Title: The Twilight's Hammer Revealed
QuestData.Description: I and everyone else thought these fools were just Dark Iron up to no good, but these nutters are fullblown cultists!$B$BThe Twilight's Hammer wants nothing short of the destruction of the entire world. They've thrown their lot in with Deathwing and Ragnaros, and they've got a history with the Dark Iron.$B$BBut it doesn't matter who they are, what matters is they're in Dun Modr and they need to get out! I'll not let any past here. You get in there and crack some skulls!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 12 Twilight's Hammer members in Dun Modr.
QuestData.RewardText: Good show, $glad:lass;, but we've no time to celebrate. Thandol Span's in danger!
